dc.title: National Eye Institute [NEI]
dc.description: NEI, of the U.S. National Institutes of Health, conducts and supports vision research. Information on eye diseases and disorders, press releases, clinical studies, grants and funding opportunities for researchers, an image and video catalog, and awareness activities to encourage early detection and treatment of eye diseases to prevent visual impairment.
